subject: Indians, American
Colleges and Universities
Tribes and Tribalism
Logos
lead_paragraph: The University of North Dakota’s use of the Fighting Sioux nickname and Indian head logo has been approved by one of the two tribes that must endorse it under a deal the college reached with the N.C.A.A.
snippet: The University of North Dakota’s use of the Fighting Sioux nickname and Indian head logo has been approved by one of the two tribes that must endorse it under a deal the college reached with the N.C.A.A.
